title: CyclingTips Podcast: Already looking forward to season 3 of Movistar’s Netflix show
content:
CyclingTips Podcast: Already looking forward to season 3 of Movistar's Netflix show

This week on the CyclingTips podcast we discuss the final week of the Vuelta a España, particularly the drama surrounding Movistar and Miguel Ángel López. Abby chats the basics from the Ceratizit Challenge by La Vuelta, and for a full breakdown check out the Freewheeling Podcast. 

Shoddy and Ronan were at the Eurobike so Shoddy gives us his top tip from the week. 

Matt de Neef spoke with Jack Haig after his podium finish at the Vuelta.
